p: The trunk from healthy A. malaccensis tree as well as those containing naturally formed and synthetically induced agarwoods were obtained from Hulu Langat (3° 7′ 0″ North, 101° 51′ 0″ East) in Selangor, Malaysia at 28 °C in the field. The plant samples were cleaned thoroughly, dried, cut into small slices, and ground mechanically.
